about_the_game:
Reclaim is a fast-paced, action-packed, arcade-style movement shooter inspired by the all time greats of the genre, both old and new.

Equipped with a faulty, non-traditional combat vessel whose power level is constantly draining, represented in-game as the score multiplier, you need to swiftly and stylishly dispatch of enemies in order to keep your power up. The higher the score multiplier, the more access you have to your suits abilities, and thus the stronger you are.

This new suit also comes fully kitted with advanced movement abilities like dashing, heel skating, and even rail grinding and these will be critical in gaining the upper hand on your enemies.

As if the sudden disappearance of residents in the cbc54 quadrant wasn't enough, there now seems to be some other life forms slowly appearing in multiple places throughout the quadrant. Since the super soldier responsible for cbc54 also seems to be MIA, you are sent in to investigate what's going on and, if need be, to put a stop to whatever it is the only way you know how to.

Embark on an enthralling and exciting adventure to uncover what's really going on in this sinister place. An adventure that takes you further than the walls of the city that houses you. An adventure filled with big guns and even bigger monsters. Although, the bigger they are, the harder they fall, and you just happen to be the make-them-fallinator.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: While I'm fairly certain it would run on computers with worse specs than this, this is the lowest I was able to test it on. Cap frames for a smoother experience.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Skate, dash, and rail-grind your way around the city while blasting through enemies with your vast arsenal of weapons, abilities, and gadgets. Keep your score multiplier up by eliminating enemies with both style and ruthless efficiency. The higher your multiplier, the more powerful you are.
